Based on the provided list, I would recommend "Inception" and "Aladdin". 

"Inception" is a mind-bending science fiction film directed by Christopher Nolan. The movie tells the story of Dom Cobb (Leonardo DiCaprio), an skilled thief who specializes in stealing corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology. His life takes an unexpected turn when he discovers that his father was actually killed by his own brother, and that their mother is also alive but has taken on her brother's identity as a terrorist leader. Dom Cobb then sets out to collect on debts owed from their family members, and is dragged deep into a seductive ambush that turns his world upside down. Dom Cobb reaches out for help from a "connected" Mulberry Street café owner, Gigetto (Frank Welker), who has more problems than just the Russian mob. Dom Cobb then sets out to collect on debts owed from their family members, and is dragged deep into a seductive ambush that turns his world upside down.
